languages.text:
Requires Overseer to have Iconoclast — 5
Cyber Mastif has +50% Wounds and +250% Damage
All damage that is dealt to Protected target is dealt to cybermastiff instead. Protecting mastiff has {uip|DamageResist|7108aa88cc5a4099a543f5f57741156c}% Damage Resistance to all other damage.

traits.locale_text:
Requires Overseer to have Iconoclast — 5
Cyber Mastif has +50% Wounds and +250% Damage
All damage that is dealt to Protected target is dealt to cybermastiff instead. Protecting mastiff has {uip|DamageResist|7108aa88cc5a4099a543f5f57741156c}% Damage Resistance to all other damage.

languages.text:
Requires Iconoclast — Zealot
The cyber-mastiff's maximum wounds are increased by +50% and it deals +250% more damage.
All damage dealt to the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally is dealt to the cyber-mastiff instead. Damage suffered by the {g|f:a63088cd6402424b8ec0c508e5143083}protecting{/g} cyber-mastiff from any source is reduced by −{uip|DamageResist|7108aa88cc5a4099a543f5f57741156c}%.

traits.locale_text:
Requires Iconoclast — Zealot
The cyber-mastiff's maximum wounds are increased by +50% and it deals +250% more damage.

The cyber-mastiff's maximum wounds are increased by +50% and it deals +250% more damage.
All damage dealt to the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally is dealt to the cyber-mastiff instead. Damage suffered by the {g|f:a63088cd6402424b8ec0c508e5143083}protecting{/g} cyber-mastiff from any source is reduced by −{uip|DamageResist|7108aa88cc5a4099a543f5f57741156c}%.

languages.text:
Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Схизматик{/g} — фанатик
Кибермастиф получает +50% к максимальному здоровью и наносит на 250% больше урона.
Весь урон, наносимый союзнику {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}под охраной{/g}, получает вместо него кибермастиф. {g|f:a63088cd6402424b8ec0c508e5143083}Охраняющий{/g} союзника кибермастиф получает на {uip|DamageResist|7108aa88cc5a4099a543f5f57741156c}% меньше урона из других источников.

traits.locale_text:
Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Схизматик{/g} — фанатик
Максимальное здоровье кибермастифа увеличено на 50%, и он наносит на 250% больше урона.
Весь урон, наносимый союзнику {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}под охраной{/g}, получает вместо него кибермастиф. {g|f:a63088cd6402424b8ec0c508e5143083}Охраняющий{/g} союзника кибермастиф получает на {uip|DamageResist|7108aa88cc5a4099a543f5f57741156c}% меньше урона из других источников.

Весь урон, наносимый союзнику {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}под охраной{/g}, получает вместо него кибермастиф. {g|f:a63088cd6402424b8ec0c508e5143083}Охраняющий{/g} союзника кибермастиф получает на {uip|DamageResist|7108aa88cc5a4099a543f5f57741156c}% меньше урона из других источников.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}革新主義{/g} ― 狂信者が必要
サイバーマスチフのg|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}{/g}が+50%上昇し、与えるダメージが+250%増加する。
{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}保護された{/g}味方に与えられるすべてのダメージは、代わりにサイバーマスティフが受ける。
{g|f:a63088cd6402424b8ec0c508e5143083}保護している{/g}サイバーマスチフが受けるダメージは −{uip|DamageResist|7108aa88cc5a4099a543f5f57741156c}%軽減される。
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot
The cyber-mastiff's maximum wounds are increased by +50% and it deals +250% more damage.
All damage dealt to the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally is dealt to the cyber-mastiff instead. The damage suffered by the {g|f:a63088cd6402424b8ec0c508e5143083}protecting{/g} cyber-mastiff from any source is reduced by −{uip|DamageResist|7108aa88cc5a4099a543f5f57741156c}%.

{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}革新主義{/g} ― 狂信者が必要

{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}保護された{/g}味方に与えられるすべてのダメージは、代わりにサイバーマスティフが受ける。
{g|f:a63088cd6402424b8ec0c508e5143083}保護している{/g}サイバーマスチフが受けるダメージは −{uip|DamageResist|7108aa88cc5a4099a543f5f57741156c}%軽減される。

languages.text:
Erfordert Ikonoklast – Eiferer
Die maximalen Wunden des Cyber-Mastiffs erhöhen sich um +50 % und er verursacht +250 % mehr Schaden.
Der gesamte Schaden, den der {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}geschützte{/g} Verbündete erleidet, wird stattdessen dem Cyber-Mastiff zugefügt. Schaden, den der {g|f:a63088cd6402424b8ec0c508e5143083}schützende{/g} Cyber-Mastiff durch beliebige Quellen erleidet, wird um −{uip|DamageResist|7108aa88cc5a4099a543f5f57741156c} % reduziert.
languages.original_text:
Requires Iconoclast — Zealot
The cyber-mastiff's maximum wounds are increased by +50% and it deals +250% more damage.
All damage dealt to the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally is dealt to the cyber-mastiff instead. Damage suffered by the {g|f:a63088cd6402424b8ec0c508e5143083}protecting{/g} cyber-mastiff from any source is reduced by −{uip|DamageResist|7108aa88cc5a4099a543f5f57741156c}%.

traits.locale_text:
Erfordert Ikonoklast – Eiferer
Die maximalen Wunden des Cyber-Mastiffs erhöhen sich um +50 % und er verursacht +250 % mehr Schaden.
Der gesamte Schaden, den der {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}geschützte{/g} Verbündete erleidet, wird stattdessen dem Cyber-Mastiff zugefügt. Schaden, den der {g|f:a63088cd6402424b8ec0c508e5143083}schützende{/g} Cyber-Mastiff durch beliebige Quellen erleidet, wird um −{uip|DamageResist|7108aa88cc5a4099a543f5f57741156c} % reduziert.

languages.text:
Ezber Bozan — Bağnaz kanaati gerektirir
Siber mastifin maksimum sağlık puanı +%50 artar ve iye, +%250 daha fazla hasar verir.
{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}Korunan{/g} dost birime verilen tüm hasar, siber mastife verilir. {g|f:a63088cd6402424b8ec0c508e5143083}Koruyan{/g} siber mastifin herhangi bir kaynaktan aldığı hasar %{uip|DamageResist|7108aa88cc5a4099a543f5f57741156c} azalır.
languages.original_text:
Requires Iconoclast — Zealot
The cyber-mastiff's maximum wounds are increased by +50% and it deals +250% more damage.
All damage dealt to the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally is dealt to the cyber-mastiff instead. Damage suffered by the {g|f:a63088cd6402424b8ec0c508e5143083}protecting{/g} cyber-mastiff from any source is reduced by −{uip|DamageResist|7108aa88cc5a4099a543f5f57741156c}%.

traits.locale_text:
Ezber Bozan — Bağnaz kanaati gerektirir
Siber mastifin maksimum sağlık puanı +%50 artar ve iye, +%250 daha fazla hasar verir.
{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}Korunan{/g} dost birime verilen tüm hasar, siber mastife verilir. {g|f:a63088cd6402424b8ec0c508e5143083}Koruyan{/g} siber mastifin herhangi bir kaynaktan aldığı hasar %{uip|DamageResist|7108aa88cc5a4099a543f5f57741156c} azalır.

languages.text:
Requiert Iconoclaste — Zélote.
Les blessures maximums du cyber-mastiff sont augmentées de +50 %, et il inflige +250 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Tous les dégâts qui devraient être infligés à l'allié {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protégé{/g} sont appliqués au cyber-mastiff. Tous les dégâts infligés à un cyber-mastiff en mode {g|f:a63088cd6402424b8ec0c508e5143083}Protection{/g} sont réduits de −{uip|DamageResist|7108aa88cc5a4099a543f5f57741156c} %.
languages.original_text:
Requires Iconoclast — Zealot
The cyber-mastiff's maximum wounds are increased by +50% and it deals +250% more damage.
All damage dealt to the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally is dealt to the cyber-mastiff instead. Damage suffered by the {g|f:a63088cd6402424b8ec0c508e5143083}protecting{/g} cyber-mastiff from any source is reduced by −{uip|DamageResist|7108aa88cc5a4099a543f5f57741156c}%.

traits.locale_text:
Requiert Iconoclaste — Zélote.
Les blessures maximums du cyber-mastiff sont augmentées de +50 %, et il inflige +250 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Tous les dégâts qui devraient être infligés à l'allié {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protégé{/g} sont appliqués au cyber-mastiff. Tous les dégâts infligés à un cyber-mastiff en mode {g|f:a63088cd6402424b8ec0c508e5143083}Protection{/g} sont réduits de −{uip|DamageResist|7108aa88cc5a4099a543f5f57741156c} %.

languages.text:
Requiere Iconoclasta: Fanático
Las heridas máximas del cibermastín aumentan en un +50 % e inflige un +250 % de daño adicional.
Todo el daño infligido al aliado {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protegido{/g} se inflige en su lugar al cibermastín. Todo el daño de cualquier tipo que sufre el cibermastín mientras {g|f:a63088cd6402424b8ec0c508e5143083}protege{/g} al aliado se reduce en un −{uip|DamageResist|7108aa88cc5a4099a543f5f57741156c} %.
languages.original_text:
Requires Iconoclast — Zealot
The cyber-mastiff's maximum wounds are increased by +50% and it deals +250% more damage.
All damage dealt to the {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protected{/g} ally is dealt to the cyber-mastiff instead. Damage suffered by the {g|f:a63088cd6402424b8ec0c508e5143083}protecting{/g} cyber-mastiff from any source is reduced by −{uip|DamageResist|7108aa88cc5a4099a543f5f57741156c}%.

traits.locale_text:
Requiere Iconoclasta: Fanático
Las heridas máximas del cibermastín aumentan en un +50 % e inflige un +250 % de daño adicional.
Todo el daño infligido al aliado {g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}protegido{/g} se inflige en su lugar al cibermastín. Todo el daño de cualquier tipo que sufre el cibermastín mientras {g|f:a63088cd6402424b8ec0c508e5143083}protege{/g} al aliado se reduce en un −{uip|DamageResist|7108aa88cc5a4099a543f5f57741156c} %.

languages.text:
需要信念：自由主义——狂热者
生化獒犬最大生命值提高50%，造成的伤害提高250%。
处于{g|f:7d75105e9e224ceab784932c12a26757}受到守护{/g}状态的盟友承受的所有伤害，都会改由{g|f:a63088cd6402424b8ec0c508e5143083}实施守护{/g}的生化獒犬承受，且生化獒犬承受的所有伤害降低{uip|DamageResist|7108aa88cc5a4099a543f5f57741156c}%。
